conclusion: To determine the position of the particle at t = 8 s, we need to calculate the displacement of the particle during the time interval t = 0 s to t = 8 s. The displacement is obtained by finding the area under the velocity-time (v-t) graph, as the area represents the integral of velocity over time, which gives displacement.
The v-t graph is divided into distinct regions, each corresponding to a different time interval. The graph consists of triangular and rectangular shapes.
